import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { domain } from "../config"; const Hours = () => { const [schedule, setSchedule] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch(`${domain}admin/hours/get`, { method: "POST", mode: "cors", cache: "no-cache", credentials: "same-origin", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data); setSchedule(data); }); console.log(schedule); }, []); function updateHandler() {} return (
Category Page
{schedule.map((item) => { return ( ); })}
Open time Close time
{item.date}
Mon
Tue
Wed
Thu
Fri
Sat
Sun
); }; export default Hours;
